text: Tata bahuto suspasta nidarsana ache, yene makame ibraahima; yiye tata praraesa karaiba si niraapada; arau manuhara majata tata yabalai yara samartha ache, allahara uddesye se'i gharara hajja karaa tara babe arasya kartabya; arau yiye kupharai karaiba si jani thoraa ucita, niscaya allaha srstijagatara mukhapeksi nahaya
